name: Dragon Simulator (itch)
description:
A short collections and combat-based casual game that's fun for the whole family! Play as Chunky the Dragon (with new, improved movement speed) as he is beholden to the bidding of the dragon Mindstrike for waking them up!

  • Avoid moving dungeon traps, or else have to restart from the last save point. 
  • Use save points to keep progress in the dungeon, or figure out the faster way to win...
  • Collect health potions to heal.
  • Collect meat and treasure to return to your dragon friend. 
  • ... And kill knights with a bite attack!

The camera stays stationary behind Chunky and follows him around. Use WASD or Arrow Keys to move around, and use Space to perform a bite attack (only damages knights). 

Made as a final project for a games scripting class.
